summary.profileStatement: Infrastructure engineer with 8 years of experience, responsible for security infrastructure design and operations in finance and public sectors. Currently focused on building observability systems and automating operations.

careers.project: Nextrade Trading Execution System Security Operations SM
careers.description:
Security operations managed service for Nextrade and support for the Information Security Team
‚Ä¢ Advanced Splunk-based security log analysis and real-time threat monitoring
‚Ä¢ Optimized FortiGate firewall policies and automated access-control operations
‚Ä¢ Strengthened infrastructure resilience through vulnerability checks and monthly security reporting
‚Ä¢ Technology: Splunk, FortiGate, Python, Linux

Designed and implemented security infrastructure for the Nextrade trading execution platform
‚Ä¢ Supported technical responses for Financial Services Commission production authorization review and established the security architecture
‚Ä¢ Designed network segmentation and access-control policies to satisfy security compliance requirements
‚Ä¢ Built FortiGate HA architecture and formalized disaster recovery procedures
‚Ä¢ Technology: FortiGate, FortiManager, Linux, VMware

Operated and automated large-scale contact center IT infrastructure

‚Ä¢ Managed infrastructure assets and applied security patches in line with internal security policies
‚Ä¢ Maintained stable business operations through technical support and incident response

personalProjects.name: Fortinet API Client
personalProjects.description: Python library for querying FortiManager policies/routes and collecting FortiAnalyzer log statistics.

metrics.features: Policy lookup, route management, and log statistics
metrics.automation: 80% time reduction compared to manual operations

personalProjects.name: Security Alert System
personalProjects.description: Detects FortiGate events in Splunk and sends alerts through Slack Block Kit. Operates 32 detection rules.

metrics.responseTime: Alert within 30 seconds after event detection

personalProjects.name: IP Blacklist Platform
personalProjects.description: Collects and analyzes malicious IP intelligence, then provides dashboards. Built with Flask API and Next.js frontend.

personalProjects.name: HYCU FSDS Autonomous Driving
personalProjects.description: Autonomous driving system based on Formula Student Driverless Simulator. Uses LiDAR cone detection (Grid BFS), Pure Pursuit path tracking, and three-tier safety state machine control. Received an Excellence Award at Hanyang Cyber University Formula Competition.
